channel.title: Vcvrack on K Ring Technologies Ltd
channel.description: Recent content in Vcvrack on K Ring Technologies Ltd

item.title: Plugins
item.description:
Ah, plugins. So the VCVRack is quite nice and my plugins there are KRTPluginA . Nice. So on to some newer code making LV2 plugins. The code is not open circa 2024, and there are many decisions to make. I’m finding carla for the test host to be OK. The OSC control feature is going to be useful.

This section of the website is also for the needed URI that LV2 needs for the manifest files. This makes the plugins Linux by design and possibly working on Mac by Darwin compatibility and Windows by MSYS2 . It seems very similar to VST and VCVRack design, and supports other formats which I don’t think I’ll be using. Hold onto your knobs.
